chapter.title: JAIN SLEE 1.1 Extensions
chapter.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE exposes proprietary extensions to the JAIN SLEE 1.1 specification, to allow the development of easier or more powerful application code.
The extensions were discussed among multiple JAIN SLEE vendors, and should become part of the standard in next revision, but there is no guarantee that portability won't be lost when using those.
The extensions source code is available in the Mobicents Community SVN, specifically at . The setup for the source project in Eclipse IDE is similar to the container core, as seen in .
Java archives (JARs) with compiled classes, javadocs and sources are available in the JBoss Maven Repository at
